show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
So, You Know What’s News? <!--more--> Test Your News Knowledge on “Pop Quiz” Leid Stories introduces “Pop Quiz,” a very sneaky way of keeping listeners on their toes.
Call in, get your news clue, then give at least three solid facts about it in 1 minute or less.
Be brave, dear friends.
This being the first Pop Quiz, there is an abundance of compassion and an ardent desire to see you shine.
Regular listeners should have no trouble at all.
